description: The National Research Council Canada (NRC) needs to purchase a Laser Tracker equipment system. The equipment will be mostly used to calibrate Robotic arm and adjust robotic path in real time. Other application such as part scanning will also be part of our usage.
full_summary:
========================================

### Tender Notice

*   **ID:** 24-58017
*   **Title:** Supply of Laser Tracker Equipment
*   **Language:** English and French
*   **Contracting Entity:** National Research Council of Canada
*   **Contact Information:**
    *   Name: Carol Mary Cooper
    *   Email: <carol.cooper@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca>
    *   Phone: (902) 293-8053
*   **Tender Status:** Expired

### Tender Overview

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) invites bids for the supply of Laser Tracker Equipment. The purpose of this procurement is to acquire a system that will enable real-time calibration of Robotic arms and automatic adjustment of robotic paths.

The Laser Tracker Equipment will be used for various applications, including but not limited to, part scanning and calibration of robotic arms.

### Tender Specifications

*   **UNSPSC Code:** 43221804 (Optical Networking Lasers)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive, Open Bidding
*   **Submission Guidelines:** Contact Carol Mary Cooper for submission details.

### Contract Requirements

*   **Duration:** Estimated contract duration: April 30, 2024, to September 30, 2024
*   **Valuation:** Low Price, History, and Past Experience
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), among others.
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada

### Tender Documents and Attachments

*   Please find the tender notice, notice invitation, and Prescribing customary arrangement inside both [English](https//canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37221/24-58017_rfp-laser-tracking-system_en_final.pdf) and [French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37221/24-58017_rfp_laser_fr.pdf).

You can download these files from the Canada Buys website. This project's complete tender requires careful review before bid submission. ### Important Dates

*   **Tender Notice Date:** April 30, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** June 3, 2024, at 2:00 PM
